item.title: BERI considers Taiwan to be a top candidate for establishing its Asia Pacific headquarters
item.description: Is your business searching for a new Asia-Pacific regional headquarters? Taiwan might be the ideal location. Business Environment Risk Intelligence (BERI) released its third “Report on the Evaluation of Environmental Risks of Investment” for 2013 in December 2013. The report ranks 50 countries and territories based on their “Profit Opportunity Recommendation” metric. Switzerland secured the top position, followed by Singapore and then Taiwan. Taiwan holds the second position globally, just behind Singapore, for operational risk.
